Constructor Summary
Choice(UUID storyId, UUID chapterIdFrom, UUID chapterIdTo, String text)
          Initializes a new choice object with no id.
Choice(UUID id, UUID storyId, UUID chapterIdFrom, UUID chapterIdTo, String text)
          Initializes a new choice object with an UUid id (needed for making a new choice after retrieving data from the database).
